name: Sea Battle
description: A strategic, turn-based, multiplayer game inspired by Battleship

gameplay.grid_setup: Players can choose the size and type of the grid at the start of the game
gameplay.ship_design: Players design their own ships, choosing their size and shape
gameplay.turn_based: Players take turns guessing coordinates to launch attacks
gameplay.special_abilities: Players can choose special abilities from a predefined list
gameplay.scoring_system: The game tracks hits, misses, and ships destroyed for each player

social_features.friend_system: Allows players to add friends, see when they are online, and invite them to games
social_features.public_lobby: A place where players can meet and chat, helping new players find friends
social_features.player_profiles: Profiles include player's name, with potential to extend to more information

technical_implementation.client_side: Developed using Phaser.js, handling game world, player input, and game logic
technical_implementation.server_side: Developed using Flask, handling player connections and game state management
technical_implementation.architecture: Server-client architecture, with server maintaining game state and clients sending requests

considerations.game_balance: Constant testing and tweaking to ensure game is balanced and fair
considerations.accessibility: Incorporate clear, readable text, high-contrast colors, intuitive controls, and support for various devices and screen sizes
considerations.security: Secure protocols for data transmission, sanitizing user inputs, secure storage of sensitive data
considerations.monetization: Donation system to support game development
considerations.feedback: System for players to leave feedback or report issues
